name: Launch Break
description:
The Game



Launch Break is a fast-paced 4-player local party game, where you must fight over a single chance to escape a crash-imminent spaceship! 🚀⏲️💥

Challenge your friends with all your arsenal, perks and the ability to shape the battleground to your advantage.

**The game currently supports up to 4 players and is playable with one keyboard and/or controllers.**

Support The Development



The game is actively under development and will have regular updates until the official release. If you wish to support it, please send us your feedback or leave a review!

Free Demo Available



We provide a free demo of our game, this will allow you to give us the feedback we need to improve the game experience. Play up to 4 players locally, or through the Remote Play Together feature!


-- Thank you for playing!--
